head_office_address: Edifici Dr. Frederic Duran i Jordà Passeig Taulat, 116
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
subsection: Other public or mixed entities, created by law whose purpose is to act in the public interest
goals__remit:
The Banc de Sang I Teixits (BST) is a public agency of the Catalan Department of Health whose mission is to guarantee the supply and proper use of human blood and tissues in Catalonia. 
BST has an international range of action, on the cutting edge in the fields of human tissues and blood, advanced therapies and biological diagnostics, comprising in its organisation a Multitissue Bank, CBB, Blood Establishment and Breast Milk Bank.
relevant_communication:
BST’s staff expertise is internationally recognized and are involved in several European initiatives and organisations, such: CoE, EATB, JACIE, Committee for Advanced Therapies (CAT), Technical Assistance and Information Exchange (TAIEX), Twinning Projects of EC, and previous EU projects namely Euro-GTP, and European Quality System for Tissue Banking (EQSTB). 
Currently BST is the Coordinator of EU Co-funded Project: EuroGTP II
